section.heading: Directory of vehicle identification tags.

para.text: Within 90 days after the applicability date of this section, the Mayor shall establish, and thereafter maintain, a directory of all vehicle identification tags issued by U.S. states and territories.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-325: § 401 of D.C. Law 25-325 provided that the creation of this section by § 114 of D.C. Law 25-325 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
